Package game.dinosaurs

Class Dinosaur

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.Dinosaur
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class Dinosaur
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
Version:
2.0.0
Author:
Allan Chan and Damien Ambegoda
See Also:
A class that contains the shared methods/attributes for all dinosaurs.
